fellowships.title: Advanced nanospectroscopy for mapping local conductivity in conductive metal-organic frameworks
fellowships.description: Development of advanced near-field nanospectroscopy techniques to map local conductivity in conductive metal-organic frameworks, combining ultrafast excitation and quantitative nano-optical analysis.

fellowships.title: Nanospectroscopy for mapping local conduction and chemical properties in polymeric conductors
fellowships.program: Ministerio de Ciencia e Innovacion - Juan de la Cierva - formacion
fellowships.description: Application of near-field optical nanospectroscopy to correlate local electrical conduction and chemical structure in polymeric conductive materials.

research_funding.title: Microscopia de campo cercano para la patologia ultraestructural sin marcadores
research_funding.description: Development of label-free near-field optical microscopy approaches for ultrastructural pathology, enabling nanoscale contrast without external markers.

research_funding.title: Advanced near-field optical nanospectroscopy and novel applications in material sciences and nanophotonics
research_funding.funder: Spanish Ministry for Science, Innovation & Universities (MICIU)
research_funding.description: Advancement of near-field optical nanospectroscopy methods and their application to emerging problems in material science and nanophotonics.

research_funding.title: A compact fiber-laser-based system for detection of hazardous biological agents via coherent Raman spectroscopy
research_funding.description: Development of a compact fiber-laser-based coherent Raman spectroscopy system for sensitive detection of hazardous biological agents.

research_funding.title: EEM-Ecoenometer
research_funding.description: Development of an FTIR-based spectrometer and analysis software for quantitative wine characterization and quality assessment.
